members.signatureBeforeChange: int kEventRawKey (int nextHandler, int theEvent, int userData)
members.signatureAfterChange: int kEventRawKey (int nextHandler, int theEvent, int userData)
diff: -	* Feature in the Macintosh.  For some reason, the default handler
-	* does not issue kEventTextInputUnicodeForKeyEvent when the user
-	* types Command+Space.  The fix is to look for this case and
-	* send the key from kEventRawKeyDown instead.
-	* NOTE: This code relies on Command+Space being consumed and
-	* will deliver two events if this ever changes.
-		OS.GetEventParameter (theEvent, OS.kEventParamKeyCode, OS.typeUInt32, null, keyCode.length * 4, null, keyCode);
-			OS.GetEventParameter (theEvent, OS.kEventParamKeyModifiers, OS.typeUInt32, null, 4, null, modifiers);

members.signatureBeforeChange: int kEventControlHit (int nextHandler, int theEvent, int userData)
members.signatureAfterChange: int kEventControlHit (int nextHandler, int theEvent, int userData)
diff: -		OS.GetEventParameter (theEvent, OS.kEventParamDirectObject, OS.typeControlRef, null, 4, null, theControl);
